lock.description: locks down or unlocks the bot

crashlog.description: gives the last unhandled crash's log

pet.description:
with no arguments, this gives you your pet's image
name renames your pet
disown deletes your pet
image sets the pet's image
background sets the pet's background
*color sets the pet's color*
*subtitle sets the text under the pet's name*

hotel.description:
custom channel you can buy in the shop

delete: deletes the hotel room
name/rename: renames the channel name
description: sets the channel description
private: makes the channel private
public: undoes private
invite: invites someone to your hotel room if it is private so they can see it too
remove: removes an invited person
lock: makes it so that only you can talk in the hotel room but other people can see it
unlock: undoes lock
hotel.syntax: a.hotel (args) (add text or mention if needed)

work.description: gives you a random amount of agnabucks (50-100) with a 60 second cooldown

fish.description:
fishes! wow
(requires you to buy a fishing rod in the shop)

doubleornothing.description: has the chance to double your money or delete it

loot.description: gives you  agnabucks once every 10 minutes

redeem.description: gives you agnabucks based on your server level (5 minute cooldown)

balbg.description: sets the image for your agnabot balance to something

websitebg.description: sets the image for your page on agnabot's website

impersonate.description: impersonates someone and makes them say something

addcategory.description: adds a possible category name to the general chat category if it gets 5 likes

reveal.description: reveals the a.say and a.impersonate commands

deletecategory.syntax: a.deletecategory (numerical index of name to delete)

speechbubble.description: gets a speechbubble from agnab's collection (why does he have so many)

furry.description: gets a random furry image from a certain google drive

furryspeechbubble.description: gets a random furry image from a certain google drive and adds a speechbubble

tts.description: sends a tts message (requires a tts pass)

sell.description: sells an item from your inventory

help.description: gives the command list or guides

setvalue.description:
sets a user's something to something
DO NOT USE THIS IF YOU DO NOT KNOW WHAT YOU'RE DOING

getvalue.description: gets a value from the db

deletevalue.description:
deletes a value in the db
DO NOT USE THIS IF YOU DO NOT KNOW WHAT YOU'RE DOING

loadwebsite.description: loads the sqlite for agnabot's website manually

badtranslate.description:
translates something 100 times and then gives back the answer
its kinda slow (sorry)
